title: Beethoven Piano Sonata No 15 phrase structure

content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following best describes the formal and motivic relationships between the four phrases of the excerpt?

choices.label: Phrases 1 and 2 are analyzed as a, a, while phrases 3 and 4 are developed with different rhythms.
Phrases 1 and 2 are analyzed as a, a, while phrases 3 and 4 are developed with thicker texture.
Phrases 1 and 2 are analyzed as a, a', while phrases 3 and 4 are developed with different rhythms.
Phrases 1 and 2 are analyzed as a, a', while phrases 3 and 4 are developed with thicker texture.

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Use terms and symbols to describe formal features and relationships in performed music, including motives, phrases, and phrase relationships.
